[COLOR_FLOAT_GOLD]GoldenAge-Brave New World[ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_FLOAT_GOLD]简介[ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_FLOAT_GOLD]Introduction[ENDCOLOR]
在原版游戏中，发展城市人口数量完全没有意义，被戏称为“养猪"。而疯狂地建立新城市，仅把每座城市的人口控制在4，这样的策略被认为是赢得神级难度AI的最佳方法，就离谱。本模组的宗旨就是鼓励玩家们能回过头来关注城市人口的发展。如今，您将会发现 “人口就是一切”，而无脑爆铺将会受到惩罚！您必须升级你的城市市政厅，从村庄到国际大都会，多个人口众多的大城市将是您获胜的关键！

[NEWLINE]In the original game, city with large populations is meaningless. Crazy expansion of new cities (Wide play) with about only 10 citizens is believed as the best strategy to win deity difficulty. The most important goal of this mod is to let you pay your attention back to the development of city population by encouraging Tall play. Now you will find that [COLOR_FLOAT_CULTURE] ‘population is everything’ [ENDCOLOR].

黄金时代同样强调城市规划的乐趣。当您把同种类型的元素摆放在一起（组成三角形或菱形时），您将会得到大量加成奖励。比如，隶属于不同城市的同一种区域相邻时，或将同一种区域围绕着对应的国家奇观摆放时，能给予您巨额区域相邻加成。又如，当您将矿山或伐木场改良设施建在一起时，能够获得大量生产力加成。甚至连相邻的森林、相邻的发电厂改良设施，都能给您带来额外产出。我很肯定您将会十分青睐全新的城市规划系统，繁荣的国际大都会少不了您对一草一木的精心规划！

GoldenAge also emphasizes the fun of urban planning. You will get super huge bonus when you put the same type of things together. For example, same districts from different cities (make a triangle or rhombus) will give you tremendous district adjacency bonus. You will also receive huge production bonus when you put mines or lumber mills together. I am pretty sure that you are going to love the new urban planning system.
黄金时代的最终目的则是使游戏变得更加有趣。我们添加了大量的新元素，包括地域人文特性、史实辉煌与至暗时代、新魅力系统、友谊的礼物、世界大战、全面战争等等！总而言之，黄金时代是文明6社区难得一见持续坚持开发的大修模组，绝大部分游戏机制已被彻底革新。

The last aim of GoldenAge is to make the game more interesting. This is accomplished by breaking the traditional way of gameplay and highlighting the characteristics of each civilization. Thus, all civilizations and leaders have been reworked. A lot of new mechanics and rules have been added, including Appeal system, Historical glorious and dark era, Regional and Cultural traits etc.
游玩本模组时，您将获得全新的游戏体验。让我们用黄金时代建立起一个伟大的帝国吧！再来亿回合！
Overall, the game has been overhauled and you will have a whole new experience. Let’s build a great empire with GoldenAge~!!
[COLOR_FLOAT_GOLD]城市与人口[ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_FLOAT_GOLD]City and Population[ENDCOLOR]
在黄金时代mod中，城市 [ICON_CITIZEN] 人口数量非常重要，而爆铺却会受到一定的限制。城市 [ICON_CITIZEN] 人口越多，城市产出越高。相反的，城市数量越多， [ICON_CITIZEN] 人口少的小城市的产出越低。

In GoldenAge, city [ICON_CITIZEN] population is very important, while madly expansion of new cities will get severe punishments. The more [ICON_CITIZEN] population in a city, the more yields you will have. On the contrary, the more cities you own, the less yields from undeveloped cities with low [ICON_CITIZEN] population you will have.
人口红利与惩罚
Population Bonus and Punishment

人口红利：[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]城市中的每个 [ICON_Citizen] 公民带来+0.4 [ICON_SCIENCE] 科技值、 [ICON_Culture] 文化值和 [ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力（原版游戏中分别为0.5,0.3,0）。[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]城市中每增加一个人口，每个 [ICON_Citizen] 公民带来的 [ICON_SCIENCE] 科技值，[ICON_Culture] 文化值和 [ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力额外+0.01。

Population Bonus: [NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Each [ICON_Citizen] Citizen in this city provide 0.4 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science, [ICON_Culture] Culture, and [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production. (which was 0.5, 0.3, and 0 in the base game)[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+0.01 extra [ICON_SCIENCE] Science, [ICON_Culture] Culture, and [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for per [ICON_Citizen] citizen when the population is increased by 1.

然而，随着人口的增长，城市需要更多的[ICON_Amenities]宜居度（来自城市设施）和[ICON_PowerInsufficient] 电力（来自杂项耗电）来满足日常需求。[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]如果 [ICON_Citizen] 人口不少于10，则-1[ICON_Amenities] 宜居度，[ICON_PowerInsufficient] 电力负荷 +1；[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]如果 [ICON_Citizen] 人口不少于20，则-2[ICON_Amenities] 宜居度，[ICON_PowerInsufficient] 电力负荷 +2；[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]如果 [ICON_Citizen] 人口不少于30，则-3[ICON_Amenities] 宜居度，[ICON_PowerInsufficient] 电力负荷 +3；[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]以此类推。

However, with the growth of population, city will need additional [ICON_Amenities] Amenities (from City Facilities) and additional [ICON_PowerInsufficient] Power (from Miscellaneous) to meet the everyday demand. [NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]If [ICON_Citizen] Population is not less than 10, -1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities, [ICON_PowerInsufficient] Power Load +1;[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]If [ICON_Citizen] Population is not less than 20, -2 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities, [ICON_PowerInsufficient] Power Load +2;[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]If [ICON_Citizen] Population is not less than 30, -3 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities, [ICON_PowerInsufficient] Power Load +3;[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]And so on.

在游戏后期，[ICON_PowerInsufficient] 电量不足的城市会受到 [ICON_Amenities] 宜居度惩罚：[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]处于现代时，-1 [ICON_Amenities]宜居度；[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]处于原子能时代时，-2 [ICON_Amenities]宜居度；[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]处于信息时代时，-3 [ICON_Amenities]宜居度；[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]处于未来时代时，-4 [ICON_Amenities]宜居度。

In the late game, city with [ICON_PowerInsufficient] insufficient power will receive a punishment on [ICON_Amenities] Amenities: [NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]-1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities when game era is Modern era; [NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]-2 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities when game era is Atomic era; [NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]-3 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities when game era is Information era; [NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]-4 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities when game era is Future era.
市政厅与城市扩建
Guildhall and Urban Expansion
建立新城市时获得一个免费的新建筑——市政厅（村庄）。当你研究特定的市政之后，可以通过城市扩建项目将市政厅升级至更高级别。完成城市扩建项目后，你还将会获得额外的 [ICON_Housing] 住房。

All cities will receive a free new building – Guildhall (Village) once they are established. Guildhall can be upgraded to higher level once you complete the new urban expansion projects which unlock at certain civics. Once you complete the urban expansion projects, you will also receive extra [ICON_Housing] housing.

市政厅有三个功能：[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet] 城市中的每个[ICON_CITIZEN] 公民将提供 [ICON_Science] 科技值、[ICON_Culture] 文化值和 [ICON_Production] 生产力，这些加成会随着市政厅等级的提高而增加。[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet] 如果城市达到了要求的 [ICON_CITIZEN] 人口数量，则减轻爆铺惩罚。最高等级的市政厅将彻底免除爆铺惩罚。[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet] 向附近友方城市释放 [ICON_PressureUp] 忠诚度压力，并向其他文明城市释放 [ICON_PressureDown] 忠诚度压力，这也会随着市政厅等级的提高而增加。

Guildhall has three functions: [NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet] Provides [ICON_Science] Science, [ICON_Culture] Culture and [ICON_Production] Production for per [ICON_CITIZEN] citizen, which will increase with Guildhall level.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet] Reduces the degree of Crazy-Expansion Punishment you experienced, if city has reached the required [ICON_CITIZEN] population. Crazy-Expansion Punishment will be waived in the highest level of Guildhall.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet] Exports [ICON_PressureUp] Loyalty pressure to your cities nearby, as well as [ICON_PressureDown] Loyalty pressure to cities from other civilizations nearby, which will also increase with Guildhall level.
市政厅的升级树为：村庄 – 小镇 – 郡县 – 城市 – 大都会。
The upgrade tree for Guildhall is: Village – Town – County – City – Metropolis.
爆铺惩罚
Crazy-Expansion Penalty
爆铺惩罚：所有城市的[ICON_Science] 科技值、[ICON_Culture] 文化值、[ICON_Gold] 金币及 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值产出[COLOR_RED]-4%* （您文明的城市总数量）[ENDCOLOR]。

Crazy-Expansion penalty: [COLOR_RED]-4%* (total number of cities in your civilization)[ENDCOLOR] yields for [ICON_Science] Science, [ICON_Culture] Culture, [ICON_Gold] Gold and [ICON_Faith] Faith for all cities.

城市人口达到一定数量以及拥有相应等级的市政厅后，爆铺惩罚可得以减轻，每座城市单独计算：[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]若城市 [ICON_CITIZEN] 人口不少于10且拥有市政厅（小镇），惩罚减轻至3%*（城市数量）；[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]若城市 [ICON_CITIZEN] 人口不少于20且拥有市政厅（郡县），惩罚减轻至2%*（城市数量）；[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]若城市 [ICON_CITIZEN] 人口不少于30且拥有市政厅（城市），惩罚减轻至1%*（城市数量）；[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]若城市 [ICON_CITIZEN] 人口不少于40且拥有市政厅（大都会），则彻底免除爆铺惩罚！

The Crazy-Expansion penalty can be mitigated when city reach certain population and has corresponding level of Guildhall, each city is counted individually: [NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]-3%*(city number) when city has no less than 10 [ICON_CITIZEN] citizens and has Guildhall-Town; [NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]-2%*(city number) when city has no less than 20 [ICON_CITIZEN] citizens and has Guildhall-County; [NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]-1%*(city number) when city has no less than 30 [ICON_CITIZEN] citizens and has Guildhall-City; [NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Waive the penalty when city has no less than 40 [ICON_CITIZEN] citizens and has Guildhall-Megalopolis!
其他城市相关改动
Other Related Changes

a) 城市单元格可以有两个 [ICON_Citizen] 公民工作。[NEWLINE]b) 每点[ICON_Amenities]宜居度可以维持的人口由2上调为3。[NEWLINE]c) 上调 [ICON_Housing] 住房对人口增长的局限性。城市人口达到 [ICON_Housing] 住房数量即停止人口增长。[NEWLINE]d) 市中心所处单元格的最低基本产出调整为2 [ICON_Food] 食物 2 [ICON_Production] 生产力，每过一个时代则额外+1 [ICON_Food] 食物+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。[NEWLINE]e) 新增6种[ICON_Amenities]宜居度状态，最低与最高的[ICON_Amenities]宜居度状态的[ICON_Amenities]宜居度跨度加大至-11~11。[NEWLINE]f) 每拥有一座城市，下一次进入 [ICON_Glory_Golden_Age] 黄金时代所需的时代得分便增加4点。[NEWLINE]g) 随着时代的进步，新城市获得更多初始人口和起始单元格。[NEWLINE]h) 来自城市人口数量的忠诚度压力上限由20上调为30。

a) City tile allows two [ICON_Citizen] citizens working on it together.[NEWLINE]b) The number of populations needed for 1 point of [ICON_Amenities] amenity is increased from 2 to 3.[NEWLINE]c) Increase the role of [ICON_Housing] housing in limiting city growth. City population stop growing if it exceeds [ICON_Housing] housing.[NEWLINE]d) Adjust the minium base yield of a city center tile to 2 [ICON_Food] food and 2 [ICON_Production] production. Additionally, +1 [ICON_Food] food and 1 [ICON_Production] production per era.[NEWLINE]e) 6 new happinesses status. Increase the [ICON_Amenities] amenity span (-11~11) between the lowest and the highest happinesses status.[NEWLINE]f) +4 era scores threshold to enter next [ICON_Glory_Golden_Age] golden age for each city you own.[NEWLINE]g) New cities start with more population and tiles with the progression of game era.[NEWLINE]h) Increase the upper limit of loyalty pressure from nearby cities' citizens from 20 to 30.
[COLOR_FLOAT_GOLD]城市规划[ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_FLOAT_GOLD]City planning[ENDCOLOR]
详细资料请前往文明百科标签“区域”和“改良设施”查看。
More detailed information can be found in the Districts and Improvements tags of Civilopedia.
区域
Districts

a) 城市中每有4个 [ICON_Citizen] 人口才能建造更多的专业化区域。而非专业化区域（如市政广场和外交区）不再有 [ICON_Citizen] 人口要求。 [NEWLINE]b) 军营和军营建筑现在不再提供 [ICON_Production] 生产力，而是改为提供 [ICON_Housing] 住房。军营和娱乐中心根据区域相邻条件提供 [ICON_Housing] 住房和 [ICON_Amenities] 宜居度。[NEWLINE]c) 不能在市中心周围建造工业区。 [NEWLINE]d) 堤坝和运河也能像水渠一样，从河流、湖泊、绿洲、山脉引水，为城市提供淡水。如果城市已经拥有了淡水，它们会额外提供+3 [ICON_Housing] 住房。 [NEWLINE]e) 除 [ICON_Housing] 住房外，水渠、下水道和社区也能提供额外的城市人口增长速度。 [NEWLINE]f) 水渠能为城市中的农场提供额外的 [ICON_Food] 食物；堤坝能为相邻的单元格提供额外的 [ICON_Production] 生产力和 [ICON_Food] 食物；运河能为相邻的单元格提供额外的 [ICON_Gold] 金币。[NEWLINE]g) 港口也获得区域防御（远程攻击）的效果，但港口和军营的远程攻击范围下调为1。

a) Require each 4 [ICON_Citizen] citizens in a city to build more Specialty districts (was 3), while non-specialty districts such as Government and Diplomatic quarter no longer have [ICON_Citizen] population requirement. [NEWLINE]b) Encampment and its buildings are now focus on [ICON_Housing] housing, but no longer provide [ICON_Production] production yield. Encampment and Entertainment Complex provide [ICON_Housing] housing and [ICON_Amenities] amenities based on their adjacency. [NEWLINE]c) Can’t build Industrial Zone near city center. [NEWLINE]d) Dam and Canal also provide fresh water (with a source of fresh water from an adjacent River, Lake, Oasis, or Mountain) like Aqueduct. If the city already has fresh water, +3 extra [ICON_Housing] housing instead. [NEWLINE]e) Aqueduct, Sewer, and Neighborhood provide extra city growth rate in addition to [ICON_Housing] housing. [NEWLINE]f) Aqueduct provides extra [ICON_Food] food for farms in the city; Dam provides extra [ICON_Food] food and [ICON_Production] production for adjacent tiles; Canal provides extra [ICON_Gold] gold for adjacent tiles. [NEWLINE]g) Add defense (range attack) for Harbor. The attack range of Encampment and Harbor are reduced to 1.
区域相邻加成
Districts Adjacency Bonus
a) 市中心像市政广场一样，能为周围区域提供标准相邻加成。 [NEWLINE]b) 一些初始相邻加成被移除，但随着科技和市政的发展，可以解锁更多的相邻加成。 [NEWLINE]c) 相同类型的特色区域（来自不同的城市）相邻时将会有非常多的相邻加成！（请规划和设计好你的城市群！）

a) City center has the standard district adjacency yield as government. [NEWLINE]b) Some initial adjacency bonuses are removed. Require the development of techs and civics to unlock more adjacency bonuses. [NEWLINE]c) If the same type of districts (from different cities) are adjacent to each other, there will be tremendous adjacency bonuses! (Plan and design your city!)
改良设施
Improvements

a) 改良设施随着科技与文化的进步获得更多产出。[NEWLINE]b) 农场/渔船/牧场/猎场/种植园提供的 [ICON_Housing] 住房改为+1。[NEWLINE]c) 渔场和市立公园改为通用改良设施，由特定科技或市政解锁，不再需要总督梁。[NEWLINE]d) 堡垒类改良设施增加移动力限制。[NEWLINE]e) 相同类型的改良设施相邻时将会有非常多的相邻加成！[NEWLINE]f) 国家公园产出等同于其 [ICON_Tourism] 旅游业绩的 [ICON_GOLD] 金币。[NEWLINE]g) 获得有其他文明特色改良设施的地块时不会自动移除该改良设施。[NEWLINE]h) 即使科技进步了，依然无法在丘陵上修建农场。[NEWLINE]i) 资源培育模式中，农场和矿山只能在资源或地貌上修建。

a) Improvements yields increase with the development of technologies and civics.[NEWLINE]b) Farm/Fishing boats/Pasture/Camp/Plantation provides +1 [ICON_Housing] housing instead of +0.5.[NEWLINE]c) Fishery and City Park become common improvements and are available after unlocking related tech and civic.[NEWLINE]d) Add movement limit to all kinds of fort.[NEWLINE]e) If the same type of improvements are adjacent to each other, there will be tremendous bonuses in their yields! [NEWLINE]f) National Parks will yield [ICON_GOLD] Gold equal to their [ICON_Tourism] Tourism output.[NEWLINE]g) Acquisition of a tile with unique improvements will no longer automatically remove them. [NEWLINE]h) Can no longer build Farm on Hills even with the progression of technologies. [NEWLINE]i) Under Resource Cultivation mode, farms and mines can only be build on tiles with resource or feature.
道路
Routes
a) 改良地块后会自动生成道路。[NEWLINE]b) 军事工程师无需消耗使用次数即可修建道路。
a) Roads will be built automatically when you improve a tile. [NEWLINE]b) Military engineer can build road without using any charge.

[COLOR_FLOAT_GOLD]City development[ENDCOLOR]
详细资料请前往文明百科标签“建筑”和“奇观和项目”查看。
More detailed information can be found in the Buildings and Wonders and Projects tags of Civilopedia.
建筑
Buildings

a) 特色区域的1、2级建筑在供电充足时也能提供额外收益。 [NEWLINE]b) （水上）娱乐区的建筑提供了更多的宜居度和更多的旅游业绩。 [NEWLINE]c) 当城市 [ICON_Citizen] 人口数量到达特定水平时，银行和证券交易所能提供额外的贸易路线。 [NEWLINE]d) 学院、剧院广场、商业中心建筑也拥有为一定范围内的市中心提供加成的效果，像工业区的工厂一样。 [NEWLINE]e) 新增学院、剧院广场、工业区的第四级建筑。 [NEWLINE]f) 调整建筑和区域(项目)的建造和维护费用。[NEWLINE]g) 大大降低核事故发生的概率，核电站变得更加安全。[NEWLINE]h) 各级城墙只增加城市血量，移除城墙的防御力加成。

a) Tier 1 and tier 2 buildings in specialty districts also provide extra yields when city is powered. [NEWLINE]b) Buildings in (water) entertainment district provide more amenities and more tourism. [NEWLINE]c) Bank and Stock-Exchange provide extra trade route when city [ICON_Citizen] population reaches specific level. [NEWLINE]d) Buildings in Campus, Theater, and Commercial Hub have regional effect like factory. [NEWLINE]e) New Tier 4 buildings for campus, theater, and industrial zone. [NEWLINE]f) Tweak the cost and maintenance of Buildings and Districts (projects). [NEWLINE]g) Nuclear accidents are much less likely to occur. [NEWLINE]h) Walls only increase city hitpoint. Remove defense strength from all levels of walls.
项目
Projects
a) 新增将战略资源转化为 [ICON_Gold] 金币的项目，以避免冗余的战略资源。[NEWLINE]b) 迁都改为全文明通用项目，由“行政部门”市政解锁。[NEWLINE]c) 无需气候协议紧急事件，在研究特定市政后即可解锁移除燃煤发电厂、燃油发电厂和核电站的项目。[NEWLINE]d) 新增多种航天项目。[NEWLINE]e) 新增多种大规模杀伤性武器项目。

a) New projects that can convert redundant strategic resources into [ICON_Gold] gold.[NEWLINE]b) Requires Spaceport district to conduct all 4 nuclear projects.[NEWLINE]c) Power Plants running on Coal, Oil, or Uranium can be decommissioned at any time after unlocking certain civics without a congress agreement. [NEWLINE]d) Add new space race projects.[NEWLINE]e) Add new WMD projects.
专家
Specialists
a) 专家提供2点对应的伟人点数!但同时上调了招募伟人的费用。[NEWLINE]b) 专业区域的建筑会增加每个专家提供的产出。[NEWLINE]c) 为军营和(水上)娱乐区增加专家槽位。由于不会产出伟人点数，娱乐中心的专家拥有更高的产出。[NEWLINE]d) 专业区域的地基也提供一个专家槽位。[NEWLINE]e) 专家额外消耗1点 [ICON_Food] 食物。

a) Specialists provide 2 corresponding great person points! But the cost of great person is increased. [NEWLINE]b) Buildings in specialty districts provide more yields for each specialist. [NEWLINE]c) Add specialist slots for Encampment and (Water) Entertainment district. Specialists from (Water) Entertainment district provide more yields as they do not provide great person points. [NEWLINE]d) Base specialty districts also provide +1 citizen slot. [NEWLINE]e) Specialists require one more [ICON_Food] food.

[NEWLINE]不同的文明将根据自己真实的历史，获得一个 [ICON_GLORY_GOLDEN_AGE] 辉煌时代和一个 [ICON_GLORY_DARK_AGE] 至暗时代。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]与游戏时代的概念不同，[ICON_GLORY_GOLDEN_AGE] 辉煌时代使所有产出+15%，[ICON_GLORY_DARK_AGE] 至暗时代使所有产出-15%。这个特殊的时代特性是根据自己的科技树和市政树所在时代，而不是世界所处时代来判定的。开启 [ICON_GLORY_GOLDEN_AGE] 辉煌时代和 [ICON_GLORY_DARK_AGE] 至暗时代的条件为：同时拥有至少一个该时代的科技和市政。脱离该时代的条件则为：同时拥有至少一个下个时代的科技和市政。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]这个系统可以让不同文明在玩法上出现很大的不同，举个例子，对 [ICON_GLORY_GOLDEN_AGE] 辉煌时代是中世纪的文明来说，游戏前期快速把科技和市政冲到中世纪是较好的策略。相反的，[ICON_GLORY_GOLDEN_AGE] 辉煌时代是远古时代的文明会考虑把所有远古时代的科技和市政点满，再进入古典时期。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]玩家可以通过巧妙地调整科技和市政解锁的先后顺序，来更久地享受 [ICON_GLORY_GOLDEN_AGE] 辉煌时代加成，和更快地脱离 [ICON_GLORY_DARK_AGE] 至暗时代。这个新系统既可以让玩家深刻体会文明在真实历史上的迭起兴衰，又提高游戏了乐趣和玩法多样性！

[NEWLINE]In this mod, each civilization has one [ICON_GLORY_GOLDEN_AGE] glorious era and [ICON_GLORY_DARK_AGE] dark era according to its true history. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Unlike game era in the base game, [ICON_GLORY_GOLDEN_AGE] glorious era provides +15% for all types of yields, while [ICON_GLORY_DARK_AGE] dark era -15% for all types of yields.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]This special era is judged by your techs and civics on the technology and civic tree. The requirement for entering a [ICON_GLORY_GOLDEN_AGE] glorious era or [ICON_GLORY_DARK_AGE] dark era is to have at least one of the technologies and civics from that specific era. And the requirement for leaving such an Era is to have at least one of the technologies and civics from the next era. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]For example, England has a [ICON_GLORY_GOLDEN_AGE] glorious industrial era and a [ICON_GLORY_DARK_AGE] dark medieval era. To get rid of the [ICON_GLORY_DARK_AGE] dark era earlier you can rush both your techs and civics to the renaissance era without finishing all of them. On the other hand, to enjoy the yields benefit longer from the [ICON_GLORY_GOLDEN_AGE] glorious industrial era, you can research all industrial techs and civics before unlocking any modern tech and civic. You can even research modern era techs while leaving the modern era civics untouched if your science yield is much higher than culture.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]This new system will change the gameplay mode of each civilization. You can plan your tech and civic development to get longer bonuses in the [ICON_GLORY_GOLDEN_AGE] Glorious Era and also to shorten the terrible [ICON_GLORY_DARK_AGE] Dark Era, which is very interesting.

正式战争：谴责敌方并等待3回合后即可宣布正式战争，之后您与目标的外交画面中则会出现“正式战争”选项。发动正式战争将导致本时代标准的不满。
圣战：研究“外交部门”市政后，如您的宗教与目标不同，则可宣布圣战。宣战之前必须先对目标进行谴责，然后等待3回合。圣战期间导致的不满为本时代标准的50%。如果希望将敌方城市夷为平地，圣战是一种外交代价较低的方式。
收复战争：研究“外交部门”市政后，如某文明占领了您建立的城市，则可宣布收复战争。宣战之前必须先对目标进行谴责，然后等待3回合。该战争借口较为特殊，以此宣战不会导致不满。成功收复城市后，即使选择将城市夷为平地也不会导致不满。也许你不忍目睹这座满目疮痍的城市，那就做个无情的暴君，一把火烧掉它吧。
保卫城邦战争：研究“外交部门”市政后，如果结盟城邦成为主要文明的战争目标，则可宣布卫国战争。宣战之前必须先对目标进行谴责，然后等待3回合。以此对目标宣战不会导致不满。但如果占领敌方城市，则会导致本时代正式战争的不满。在卫国战争期间将敌方城市夷为平地将使国际社会不再承认卫国战争的合法性，从而导致额外的不满。
解放战争：研究“外交部门”市政后，如果友邦或同盟的城市被占领，则可宣布解放战争。宣战之前必须先对目标进行谴责，然后等待3回合。以此对目标宣战不会导致不满。但如果占领其他的敌方城市，则会导致等于本时代正式战争的不满；而如果将敌方城市夷为平地，则会导致即为严重的不满！以自由的名义焚毁城市会在世界其他文明中产生极其恶劣的外交影响，所以导致的不满也会极其高昂。
殖民战争：研究完“民族主义”市政后，即可对落后2个科技的文明发动殖民战争。宣战之前必须先对目标进行谴责，然后等待3回合。使用此战争借口宣战和占领城市在本时代导致的不满将降低。但如若将敌方城市夷为平地，世界将不再相信“启蒙开化”这个所谓的理由，文明会获得本时代正式战争的全额不满。
领土扩张战争：研究“动员”市政后，即可对文明宣布领土扩张战争。前提是目标文明在您2座城市的10个单元格范围内拥有2座城市。宣战之前必须先对目标进行谴责，然后等待3回合。用该战争借口宣战并占领城市所导致的正式战争不满将稍微降低。在此战争借口中将敌方城市夷为平地所导致的不满将降低。如果希望摧毁阻碍扩张路线的敌方城市，此战争借口将十分实用。
报复战争：研究“帝国初期”市政后，如另一文明在过去30回合内曾背弃对您的承诺，则可宣布报复战争。宣战之前必须先对目标进行谴责，然后等待3回合。报复战争期间仅会导致当前时代50%的不满。因为即使敌人曾违背对您的承诺，也不能焚毁城市来泄愤。
意识形态战争：研究“意识形态”市政后，如目标拥有不同的第3级政体，则可宣布意识形态战争。宣战之前必须先对目标进行谴责，然后等待3回合。意识形态战争期间仅会导致当前时代50%的不满。

Formal War: You may declare a Formal War after Denouncing an enemy and waiting for 3 turns, after which the Formal War option will be available to you in the diplomacy screen with your target. Formal War carries the current era's standard Grievance penalties.

Holy War: You may declare a Holy War if your religion differs from that of your target, you've researched the Diplomatic Service Civic, and you've denounced your target and waited 3 turns. During a Holy War, only 50% of the current era's Grievance penalty applies. If you wish to raze enemy cities, Holy War is one of the least diplomatically costly ways to do so.

Reconquest War: You may declare a Reconquest War if another civilization has captured a city that you founded, and have researched the Diplomatic Service Civic. You must Denounce your target and wait 3 turns before declaring war. This Casus Belli is unique in that it generates no additional Grievances against you. You may also choose to raze your reconquest city without penalty if you successfully capture it. Perhaps you cannot bear the sight of your retaken city? You're the implacable tyrant; do what you want.

Protectorate War: You may declare a Protectorate War if one of your allied city-states is targeted for war by a major civilization, and if you have researched the Diplomatic Service Civic. You must denounce your target and wait 3 turns before declaring war. There is no Grievance penalty for declaring war on your target, but you will suffer the era's Grievance penalty equal to a Formal War if you capture an enemy city. Razing an enemy city during a Protectorate War carries an additional Grievance penalty, as the world does not recognize your Protectorate War as legitimating your land grab.

Liberation War: You may declare a Liberation War if a friend or ally had cities conquered, and if you have researched the Diplomatic Service Civic. You must denounce your target and wait 3 turns before declaring war. There is no Grievance penalty for declaring war on your target. You will suffer the era's Grievance penalty equal to a Formal War if you capture another, different enemy city. If you raze an enemy city, you will suffer a very severe Grievance penalty! This is the most Grievance-costly action in the game, as burning cities in the name of freedom is particularly awful to the other civilizations in the world.

Colonial War: You may declare a Colonial War against a civilization which is lagging behind you by 2 technologies, and you have researched the Nationalism Civic. You must denounce your target and wait 3 turns before declaring war. This Casus Belli has a reduced Grievance penalty for the era, both for declaring war and capturing cities. If you raze an enemy city, you will receive the full Grievance penalty for a Formal War of the era, as the world no longer buys your excuses about "bringing enlightenment" to your target.

Territorial War: You may declare Territorial War against a civilization if you have researched the Mobilization Civic. The target must have 2 cities within 10 tiles of 2 of your cities. You must denounce your target and wait 3 turns. This Casus Belli reduces the era's Formal War Grievance penalty by a bit, both for the actions of declaring war and capturing cities. Razing cities carries a reduced penalty under this Casus Belli, making it useful if you wish to eliminate enemy cities in regions where you wish to expand.

War of Retribution: You may declare a War of Retribution if you have researched the Early Empire Civic, and another civilization has broken a promise they made to you within the last 30 turns. You must denounce your target and wait 3 turns before declaring war. During a War of Retribution only 50% of the current era's Grievance penalty applies. Although an enemy may have broken his promise to you, this does not entitle you to burn his cities to the ground in revenge.

Ideological War: You may declare an Ideological War if you research the Ideology Civic, and have a different Tier 3 government from your target. You must denounce your target and wait 3 turns. During an Ideological War only 50% of the current era's Grievance penalty applies.
